name: Micheal Paul
description:
I am Micheal Paul, 53yrs old man ,an International contractor that deals with the construction of roads and bridges. I am into this website and saw you profile email today . am interested in a nice woman i will love forever because i am a man that knows how to make a woman smile. I believe in long distance relationship no matter the age, color, distance and languages. Because it needs a lot of strength and courage. I will like you to write to me through my email below so that we can start expressing your feelings together.
My id is: michealpaul@live.com
Micheal Paul.
